context: I like the movie Gone Girl. Can you recommend something similar?
Sure, Gone Girl is a Thriller, other Thrillers include Graduation Day and Das Boot. Have you heard of those?
No, I haven't. Can you tell me more about Graduation Day?
Absolutely! Graduation day is also considered a Slasher movie. It is starring Vanna White and it is rated R.
Is Linnea Quigley is that one? I like her work. What else is she in?
Great choice, Linnea Quigley is also in Jack-O.
She's in Zombiegeddon too, right? Do you know anything about that one?
Yes, Quigley played alongside Uwe Ball, Lloyd Kaufman, and Edwin Neal- who also was in The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.
Those all sound great. I don't know anything about Uwe Ball though. Has he been in other films?
resp: I don't see any information on other movies he has acted in, however, he directed and produced the Horror film BloodRayne.

context.content: "Speed" is a 1994 action thriller film starring Keanu Reeves and Sandra Bullock. The movie follows a Los Angeles SWAT team specialist who must defuse a bomb on a city bus that will explode if the bus goes below 50 mph. It's packed with adrenaline-pumping action, intense suspense, and thrilling adventure as the characters race against time to save the passengers.

Hmm, "Speed" sounds like it has a lot of action and suspense, but I'm not sure if it has the thrilling adventure aspect I'm looking for. I think I'll pass on this one. Do you have any other recommendations that might fit my preferences?
